report-configuration.name: ConsequenceCSVReport
report-configuration.empty-message: Não existem dados para esse relatório.
report-configuration.report-query: select consequences.objid as "Billcheckout ID", rules.rule_name as "Nome da Regra", cycles.cut_date as "Data de Fim do Ciclo", carriers.carrier_code as "Código da Operadora", carriers.carrier_state as "Estado", accounts.account_number as "Número da Conta", consequenceAttributes.attr_name as AttributeHeader, consequenceAttributes.attr_value as AttributeValue, consequences.description as "Descrição" from bck_rule rules, bck_account_dm accounts, bck_consequence consequences, bck_carrier_dm carriers, bck_cycle_dm cycles, bck_consequence_attr consequenceAttributes where rules.rule_code = $P{RULE_CODE} and consequences.transaction_id = $P{TRANSACTION_ID} and consequences.rule_uid = rules.objid and consequences.account_uid = accounts.objid and consequences.cycle_uid = cycles.objid and consequences.carrier_uid = carriers.objid and consequences.objid = consequenceAttributes.consequence_uid order by consequences.objid, rules.rule_name, accounts.account_number, cycles.cut_date, carriers.carrier_code, carriers.carrier_state, consequences.description, consequenceAttributes.attr_name
